=== IMU / Sensor boards ==

 * FreeIMU 0.3.5 BMP: it's a sensor board with 
   * ITG3205 3-axis gyro 
   * BMA180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis magnetometer
   * BMP085 absolute pressure sensor
     You will find it at the [http://viacopter.eu/index.php Viacopter shop].

 * FreeIMU 0.3.5 MS: it's a sensor board with
   * ITG3200 3-axis gyro
   * BMA 180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis compass
   * MS5611-01BA01 Highprecision altimeter
http://code.google.com/p/megapirate/source/browse/wiki/Images/FreeIMU_0_3_5MS.jpg
     You will find it at the [http://viacopter.eu/index.php Viacopter shop].

 * Allinone: it's a sensor board with
   * ITG3200 3-axis gyro
   * BMA180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis magnetometer
   * BMP085 absolute pressure sensor
     you will find it in this [http://www.ebay.com/sch/csg_and_rc_extreme/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686 Ebay store].

 * Allinone2: it's a sensor board with
   * ITG3200 3-axis gyro
   * BMA180 3-axis accelerometer
   * HMC5883L 3-axis magnetometer
   * BMP085 absolute pressure sensor
   * NEO-6Q/M GPS receiver 
      you will find it in this [http://www.ebay.com/sch/csg_and_rc_extreme/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686 Ebay store].
